reviews.customers_say: Customers find the dress amazing in quality and appreciate its perfect fit and flattering appearance. The dress is comfortable, stretchy, and thick, with one customer noting it's not thin or see-through. The material quality receives mixed feedback, with some customers describing it as nice while others find it cheap. items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Buy the dress!!
items.body: This dress was so perfect, the fit, the split, the silky texture. So worth the money, I got so many compliments and danced the night away. I felt like a million bucks! Read more
items.author: Karinforya

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Gorgeous!
items.body: Super happy, can’t beat the price for this gorgeous dress. Beautiful material, thick and a good stretch. Ordered size small which states for size 4, size 2 usually worn but it fit perfect. Read more
items.author: Brett Inglehart

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Fits true to size
items.body: This dress exceeds expectations! Fit like an absolute glove. Quality was on point and was so comfortable. Ordered a size small and my daughter is 5’3 112 lbs and the dress looked like it was designed just for her! This dress is a go!!! Read more
items.author: Customer

items.title: 1.0 out of 5 stars More like spandex than satin
items.body: Does not look like satin at all once you try it on. It’s more of a spandex material and it is very thin so you can see any undergarments. Read more
items.author: Monica I.

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Sexy, fabulous
items.body: This dress looked very fancy, beautiful and sexy. We had to send it back because my daughter was too young for a dress like this, but an older teen or twenty something would like amazing in this dress. She tried on a size small, 5’6’’ 139 athletic build. We might have kept it but the slit was really high and I didn’t think she was old enough for something like that. Read more
items.author: Customer

items.title: 4.0 out of 5 stars Beautiful! yet too revealing in the back for me
items.body: Very nice dress. Beautiful color and material. A little too open in the back for my taste. It fit well for my frame 5’10 / 169lbs but too revealing for my preference Read more
items.author: Skye Square

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Gorgeous!
items.body: I got this last minute for a party and it’s stunning! It’s satin material and feels/looks very expensive Read more
items.author: Simmone

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars IF YOU'RE THINKIN ABOUT GETTING IT JUST GET IT
items.body: i loved my dress so much! i wore this to a wedding reception and received so many compliments. i also just used a sticky bra on the inside. i got a size small. i'm 5'4" and 130lbs! it was absolutely flattering. but i did need help to tie the tie on the back behind my neck to keep it tight because if it's loose, it'll make the side of the dress look kinda weird. it'll look loose under the armpit area. it's a bit stretchy and comfortable as well! the material is pretty thick and doesn't feel cheap at all! Read more
items.author: Danielle Wilson

short_description:
Womens Maxi Dress Split High Split Maxi Sleeveless is made for a polished look that still feels comfortable to wear. It is designed to sit cleanly on the body with a flattering shape that works for day plans and dressier moments without feeling overdone.

The fit focuses on balance rather than extremes, so you can move naturally while still getting a defined silhouette. Choose your usual size for a closer look, or size up if you prefer a little more ease through the waist and hips.

Styling is simple: keep accessories minimal for a clean finish, or add a jacket and statement shoes when you want a sharper outfit. This piece photographs well thanks to smooth lines and a structured feel that stays put once you have it adjusted.

With the right fit and simple styling, this item becomes an easy go-to when you want something that looks intentional without requiring extra effort.

Comfort comes from both the cut and the fabric, so selecting your preferred fit makes a noticeable difference over a full day of wear.

The design is easy to style with simple accessories and works well in photos thanks to clean lines and a balanced silhouette.

long_description:
Womens Maxi Dress Split High Split Maxi Sleeveless is a versatile piece you can reach for when you want a put-together look that still feels comfortable. The goal is simple: a silhouette that reads polished, photographs well, and stays wearable for a full day or a long night.

Fit and sizing Fit is where most outfits win or lose. This design aims for a balanced shape with a defined line through the torso, a clean waist, and a smooth finish through the hips and legs. If you prefer a more relaxed feel, size up; if you like a closer fit, stay true to size. Sizes may include: 5, 5.5, 6, 6.5, 7, 7.5, 8, 8.5, 9, 9.5, 10, 11.

Fabric and comfort Comfort is not just about softness. It is also about movement and how the fabric behaves as you walk, sit, and stand. A fabric blend with a bit of give helps it keep its shape while still feeling wearable.

Highlights A clean neckline and a refined silhouette for an elevated look. Designed to layer easily with jackets, wraps, or sweaters. Works well with both minimal accessories and statement pieces.

How to style Styling ideas: keep it minimal with neutral shoes and one standout accessory. For a relaxed daytime look, add a denim jacket or cardigan. For events, switch to a bolder shoe and a small clutch for a sharper finish.

Color notes Available colors may include: Red, Rose Red, Purple, Black. If a shade is sold out, check back as availability can change.

Care Care guidance matters if you want it to keep its shape and finish. Follow the label first.
